title: 5G Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/27/20
itunes:title: 5G Technology - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/27/20
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and science writer Joseph Olson discuss his research into magnetobiology, and how electromagnetic radiation from new 5G cellar phone towers may be making symptoms of COVID-19 even worse and is being covered up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
